sentences.en: Bureaucracy is ever desirous of spreading its influence and its power.
sentences.cn: 官僚主义无时无刻不想扩大它的影响和权力.

sentences.en: Everybody is desirous of success [ to succeed ].
sentences.cn: 每人 都想获得成功.

sentences.en: He is desirous of her hand in marriage.
He is strongly desirous that you should attend the meeting.
I fancy Clodius is desirous to be your successor.
sentences.cn: 我相信克罗狄俄斯想接替你的位子呢.

sentences.en: I'm desirous that you should give me some job to do.
sentences.cn: 我渴望你能给我些事做.

sentences.en: Sam: Why are you desirous to get this position?
sentences.cn: 山姆: 你为什么想要得到这份工作?

sentences.en: She had come, desirous to know the extent of Mary's grief for Mr. Carson.
sentences.cn: 她来到这里以前, 原想要知道玛丽对卡尔逊到底悲痛到怎样的程度.

sentences.en: The desirous Carrie was whispered to concerning her possibilities.
sentences.cn: 那个充满向往的嘉莉在悄悄地提醒她,该考虑自己的前途了.

sentences.en: The enemy is so desirous of peace that he will agree to any terms.
sentences.cn: 敌方急欲求和，什么条件他都会答应。

sentences.en: The woman seemed desirous, Yet reluctant, to speak, and answered in low, mysterious tone.
sentences.cn: 那妇人好象想说, 但又有点踌躇, 她放低了嗓门神秘地说.

sentences.en: We are desirous of extending our connections in your country.
sentences.cn: 我们拟拓展本公司在贵国的业务.

sentences.en: Whatever Marianne was desirous of, her mother would be eager to promote.
sentences.cn: 无论玛丽安要干什么, 她母亲总是热情促成.

sentences.en: Why are you desirous of leaving your present employer?
sentences.cn: 你为什么要离开现在的雇主?

sentences.en: Why are you desirous of leaving your present job?
sentences.cn: 为什么你要放弃现在那份工作?

words.tran_cn: 渴望，要求（desire的过去分词形式）
